coreAttributes.name: plunge-neck clubbing dress
coreAttributes.description: A short-skirted dress with a deep, revealing plunge neck. The skimpy fabric leaves the wearer's stomach and breasts completely on display...

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.steps] into the clubbing dress, before pulling it up around [npc.her] [npc.hips+] and [npc.breasts+] and then tying the straps into a loose bow behind [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the clubbing dress, before pulling it up around [npc2.her] [npc2.hips+] and [npc2.breasts+] and then tying the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the clubbing dress, before yanking it up around [npc2.her] [npc2.hips+] and [npc2.breasts+] and then tying the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the straps [npc.steps] out of [npc.her] clubbing dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.herHim] to [npc2.step] out of it.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.herHim] to [npc2.step] out of it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt of [npc.her] clubbing dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress back down into the proper position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] clubbing dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the skirt of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress, before roughly pulling it up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc.her] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to fall down around [npc.her] waist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to fall down around [npc2.her] waist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(yank)] the top half down around [npc2.her] waist.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the top half of [npc.her] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(tie)] the straps into a loose bow behind [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the top half of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(tie)] the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] up the top half of [npc2.namePos] clubbing dress and [npc.verb(tie)] the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.
